member.name: M:CSF.Configuration.ConfigurationHelper.GetDefaultConfigurationPath``1
member.summary: Gets the default configuration path for a type that implements .

remarks.para: For configuration sections decorated with , this method returns the path specified in the attribute.
For all other types, the return value is equivalent to the full name of the specified type, substituting the period '.' character with a forward-slash character '/'

member.summary: Attribute used to indicate the path (in a configuration file) where this class is found.

remarks.para: By default, configuration types are found at a path based upon their namespace. This attributes permits overriding that and specifying an alternative path.
